mapper.select: select count(*) from ujcms_org_tree t where (t.ancestor_id_ = #{userOrgId} and t.descendant_id_ = #{siteOrgId}) or (t.descendant_id_ = #{userOrgId} and t.ancestor_id_ = #{siteOrgId})
mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_org_tree where descendant_id_ in (select temp1_.descendant_id_ from (select descendant_id_ from ujcms_org_tree where ancestor_id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}) temp1_) and ancestor_id_ in (select temp2.ancestor_id_ from (select ancestor_id_ from ujcms_org_tree where descendant_id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ancestor_id_ <> descendant_id_) temp2)
delete from ujcms_org_tree where descendant_id_ in ( select temp_.descendant_id_ from (select t.descendant_id_ from ujcms_org_tree t where t.ancestor_id_ = #{ancestorId}) temp_ )
